backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing debate orchestration, user profiles, agent registry with pre-populated agents (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, etc.), file metadata storage, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, hooks, and configuration files describing the React application structure with speech recognition, debate display, agent management, and file upload capabilities.
frontend/.env: Local development environment configuration specifying backend canister ID (bkyz2-fmaaa-aaaaa-qaaaq-cai) and local DFX network.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment configuration with the same canister ID and IC mainnet network setting.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette defining neutral grayscale design tokens for light and dark modes, including sidebar, chart, and destructive color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the application titled 'The Gang' with a root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with three tabs (Boardroom, Sensory Cortex, Swarm Health), authentication handling, debate controls including push-to-talk and text command input, and transcript download functionality.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table displaying system infrastructure vitals, agent status with toggle switches, memory usage progress bars, cycle counts, and diagnostic log modal integration.
frontend/src/components/CrashLogModal.ts: Modal dialog component displaying agent diagnostics with monospace terminal-style UI showing telemetry status and system messages in green-on-black theme.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays a debate transcript with speaker badges (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, SYSTEM), auto-scrolling, and text-to-speech functionality. Shows emergency mode indicator and parses transcript lines by speaker.
Provides a button to interrupt/stop an active debate by canceling speech synthesis and calling the backend abort mutation.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements a push-to-talk button using speech recognition that starts/stops listening and calls onTranscriptComplete callback when speech recognition stops with new transcript.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file uploads (drag-drop, manual, camera) with chunked processing for large files, routes documents to agents, and displays upload progress with text/image preview generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance based on Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for debate operations (start, abort, clear, status polling), agent management (get statuses, toggle), and document routing with placeholder implementations.
Wraps Web Speech Recognition API with React hooks, providing start/stop controls, transcript state, error handling, and browser support detection using functional state updates to prevent stale closures.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: React hook that wraps the Web Speech API for text-to-speech, providing speak/cancel functions, voice selection (with British male voice preference), and speaking state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub for future wake word detection integration using Picovoice Porcupine library to trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, plus base typography and code font styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by removing HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown links into clickable anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration with React plugin, environment variable injection for canister IDs, path aliases, and local development proxy for API calls to dfx replica.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting the single-user Internet Identity-secured architecture, removal of all backend auth checks, locked Golden Master backend (v56), multi-canister telemetry setup, and existing features list.
